title: Who said “off with their heads” in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: Robespierre during *The Terror 1793–1794, by decree on Public Safety, 40,000 were were believed to have been executed by guillotine , (mostly clergy and aristocrats, including, ironically, Robespierre, himself. **EXECUTIONS…THE GUILLOTINE AND THE FRENCH REVOLUTION …MICHAEL R. Lynn 88
No one. It's a quote from the Queen of Hearts, a character from Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll.
